alert.note: Alert for Boone; Clay; Jackson; Kanawha; Mason; Northwest Fayette; Northwest Raleigh; Putnam; Roane; Southeast Fayette; Southeast Raleigh (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Mason, northeastern Cabell, Kanawha, Putnam, eastern Lincoln, southwestern Roane, northwestern Raleigh, central Logan, southwestern Clay, southeastern Jackson, western Fayette and Boone Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1044 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Culloden to near Spurlockville to 6 miles northwest of Amherstdale-Robinette. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Nitro, Madison, Fayetteville, Winfield, Hamlin, Jefferson, South Charleston, St. Albans, Dunbar, Oak Hill, Hurricane, Sissonville, Milton, Montgomery, Chesapeake, Eleanor, Marmet, Mount Hope and Ansted. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 1 and 21. Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 96 and 128. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 25 and 57. West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 48 and 95. Route 119 between mile markers 39 and 80. Route 19 between mile markers 1 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Boone; Clay; Jackson; Kanawha; Mason; Northwest Fayette; Northwest Raleigh; Putnam; Roane; Southeast Fayette; Southeast Raleigh
